welcome.WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: Please tap on the blue button below to begin. You will be redirected to our website to continue.

forgot_password.SUBTITLE_FORGOT_YOUR_PASSWORD: If you forget your password, please enter your email address below to be emailed a OTP

verify_otp.SUBTITLE_VERIFY_OTP: Enter the code you received in your email.

reset_password.SUBTITLE_RESET_YOUR_PASSWORD: If you forget your password, please enter your email address below to be emailed a OTP
reset_password.LABEL_PASSWORD_CONDITION2: A mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters
reset_password.LABEL_PASSWORD_CONDITION3: A mixture of letters and numbers
reset_password.LABEL_PASSWORD_CONDITION4: Inclusive of at least one special charater, e.g., ! @ # ?

reset_password_success.SUBTITLE_RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: Your password has been reset, Now just sign in to get started.

verify_email.SUBTITLE_VERIFY_EMAIL: Enter your email to receive the verification code in your inbox.
